properties.name: app.scraping.bazos.interval-hours
properties.description: Interval in hours between scraping runs for each category

properties.name: app.scraping.bazos.stagger-start
properties.description: Whether to stagger the start times of category scraping jobs

properties.name: app.scraping.bazos.max-concurrent-categories
properties.description: Maximum number of categories to scrape concurrently

properties.name: app.scraping.bazos.duplicate-stop-threshold
properties.description: Stop scraping when this ratio of parts on a page are duplicates (0.8 = 80%)

properties.name: app.scraping.bazos.min-new-parts-threshold
properties.description: Stop scraping when fewer than this many new parts found on a page
